faces.name: ID Minor
faces.description: Pick any action face on the minor terrain (magic, melee, or missile). Turn the die to the selected face.

faces.name: Melee Minor
faces.description: The controlling army may conduct a Melee action or the action shown on the terrain.

faces.name: Magic Minor
faces.description: The controlling army may conduct a Magic action or the action shown on the terrain.

faces.name: Double Saves Minor
faces.description: The controlling army doubles its ID results when rolling for saves.

faces.name: Grove
faces.description: During the Eighth Face Phase move one non-Dragonkin unit from any player's BUA to their DUA, a Dragonkin unit or minor terrain from your BUA to your Summoning Pool, or an Item from your BUA to your army controlling this eighth face. This is not optional and must be performed if possible.

faces.name: Temple
faces.description: Your controlling army and all units in it cannot be affected by any opponent's death (black) magic. During the Eighth Face Phase you may force another player to bury one unit of their choice in their DUA.

faces.description: Your controlling army may use a missile action to attack any opponent's army. If attacking a Reserve Army, only count non-ID missile results.

faces.name: Vortex
faces.description: During any non-maneuver army roll at this terrain, before resolving SAI's (see  step 2 of Die Roll Resolution'), you may reroll one unit, ignoring the previous result.
